hero.title: London Field Pack
hero.subtitle: Optimized for multi-airport transfers, rail service interruptions, and weather volatility.

sections.title: Arrival and Entry
sections.summary: Anchor your plan by airport and final zone before booking ground transport.
actions: Store terminal-specific rail and coach exits.
Plan airport fallback if primary line is disrupted.
Pin first-night location in offline maps with postcode.

sections.title: Mobility and Route Resilience
sections.summary: Build around line-level alternatives, not only station-level alternatives.
actions: Track at least one bus route replacement for every key train move.
Schedule intercity or airport trips outside crush periods.
Maintain walking-safe fallback for short central hops.

sections.title: Payments and Connectivity
sections.summary: Use contactless-first while preserving one backup card and emergency cash.
actions: Enable transit-compatible contactless limits before departure.
Keep one secondary payment card physically separate.
Cache station Wi-Fi and hotel Wi-Fi credentials offline.

sections.title: Disruption Playbook
sections.summary: When weather or rail disruptions stack, shift to district clusters and shorter loops.
actions: Extend buffer before any airport departure.
Reduce interline transfers when alerts rise.
